stories.title: Western coverage of Ukraine war criticised
Treasury Prohibits Transactions with Russian C Bank and Sanctions Wealth Sources

stories.text:
Since Russia started the invasion of Ukraine, I feel sad and baffled while being glued to news sources covering the war, mostly on Twitter.

How do you keep your focus on working during these times?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you get work done while there is a war in Europe?
Have fun acting like ants in a modern economy
MacPawâ€™s Operations Amidst the Russian Aggression Against Ukraine
Russian central bank lifts interest rates to 20% as ruble plunges over sanctions
Russia hikes key rate to 20% in emergency move, tells companies to sell FX

stories.text:
Hi, In my company we are making merge requests Feature branch -> Development first, once it is approved and then to Acceptance and then to Master.

The problem with this approach is time taking and switching bunch of tabs and asking colleagues again to review with new MR links.

I am searching or hopefully making one tool where I can make a one sequential merge request e.g: feature->develop->master all at ONCE, and tool will show the overview combining all, and respective people can give permissions at the right spot.

let me know if it is a good idea or tools which already exist
stories.title: Sequential Merge Requests in one view
Toyota suspends domestic factory operations after suspected cyber attack
